description.value:
1. Forbidden Knowledge (200xp): Gain one Common Lore and one Forbidden lore trained skill you didn't have. Gain Paranoia and Enemy Talent for group Lore was stolen from.
2. Warp Incursion (100xp): Gaint Resistance (Psychic Powers) and Light Sleeper Talents. Gain 1d5 Corruption Points.
3. Dark Secret (200xp): +6 to any one Characteristic. 1d5 Insanity Points. Character possesses a dark and difficult to get rid of secret or curse (work with GM).

talents: for group Lore was stolen from
